column1: #text=It has been six months since I got my hair cut .
#text=I usually get it cut really short and let it grow out to be shaggy .
#text=I usually just go to whichever local salon is closest , and I do n't have a regular person who usually cuts my hair .
#text=I only like to spend about $ 15 each time I go .
#text=Today , I decided get a faded haircut .
#text=The nearest place only charges $ 10 , so I was pleased with that .
#text=The lady who helped me was named Sarah , and she talked a lot about the weather and how much she wanted to be outside .
#text=She also asked me a lot about my job , and it turns out her husband also works where I work .
#text=The haircut took about 15 minutes and she did a pretty good job .
#text=It 's just the right length and she cut the back of my hair the way I like most .
